## Resources {.section-title}
:::
:::

::: {.resources-intro .scroll-animate}
Comprehensive collection of resources, tools, and references that have been instrumental in my engineering journey. From course materials to development environments, these resources support continuous learning and technical growth in embedded systems, FPGA design, and engineering innovation.
:::

::: {.two-column-layout}
::: {.left-column}
::: {.section-title-container}
## Development Tools {.section-title}
:::

::: {.resources-section .scroll-animate}
**FPGA Development**
- Quartus Prime - Intel's FPGA design software
- ModelSim - Simulation and verification tool
- SignalTap Logic Analyzer - Real-time debugging

**Microcontroller Development**
- ARM Keil MDK-ARM - Integrated development environment
- STM32CubeIDE - STM32 development platform
- GDB Debugger - GNU debugger for embedded systems

**Hardware Tools**
- Oscilloscopes - Signal analysis and debugging
- Logic Analyzers - Digital signal analysis
- Multimeters - Electrical measurements
- Power Supplies - Variable voltage/current sources
:::

::: {.section-title-container}
## Course Materials {.section-title}
:::

::: {.resources-section .scroll-animate}
**E155: Microcontrollers & FPGA Design**
- Lab Instructions - Step-by-step lab procedures
- Lecture Notes - Course content and concepts
- Reference Designs - Example implementations
- Assessment Rubrics - Evaluation criteria

**Additional Courses**
- Digital Electronics - Circuit analysis and design
- Product Management - Business strategy and development
- Economic Analysis - Quantitative methods and modeling
:::
:::

::: {.right-column}
::: {.section-title-container}
## Learning Resources {.section-title}
:::

::: {.resources-section .scroll-animate}
**Embedded Systems**
- ARM Cortex-M4 Documentation - Official ARM reference manuals
- STM32 Reference Manuals - STMicroelectronics documentation
- Real-Time Systems Design - Academic papers and textbooks

**FPGA Design**
- Intel Cyclone V Handbook - FPGA architecture and design
- Verilog/SystemVerilog - Hardware description languages
- Digital Design Principles - Circuit design fundamentals

**Programming Languages**
- C Programming - Embedded systems programming
- ARM Assembly - Low-level programming and optimization
- Python - Data analysis and automation
:::
